chapters.title: Chapter 25: Quick Fragments
chapters.info: Merise Haindehl, p. 457—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah from Tarabon. She has dark hair and very blue eyes, and is tall. She has three Warders, including Jahar Narishma, one of the Asha'man. She is involved with Cadsuane's plans, and took part in the interrogation of Semirhage. She accompanies Narishman in battle as well, and fights at Shayol Ghul. See also Narishma, Jahar.
